every day I wake up and begin the 16 hour process of getting ready for bed

it's kind of crazy to consider how cheap books are; each one represents hundreds and hundreds or maybe thousands of hours of work, thinking, writing, editing, research, and interviewing....for a total cost of $10-15.
tech tip: tell your PC that you appreciate it once in a while
